traits.name: Assassinate
entries: During its first turn, Ghald has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit Ghald scores against a {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised} creature is a critical hit.

traits.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: Ghald can breathe air and water, but he needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

traits.name: Shark Telepathy
entries: Ghald can magically command any shark within 120 feet of him, using a limited telepathy.

traits.name: Sneak Attack
entries: Ghald deals an extra 14 ({@dice 4d6}) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Ghald's that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and Ghald doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Ghald makes three attacks, one with his bite and two with his shortswords.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 9 (2d4 + 4 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shortsword
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 11 (2d6 + 4 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Garrote
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or Small creature against which Ghald has advantage on the attack roll. 9 (2d4 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 15). Until the grapple ends, the target can't breathe, and Ghald has advantage on attack rolls against it.
